media.headline: Gibson's K on Gordon
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Gibson strikes out Gordon swinging in the 1st
media.bigblurb: Kyle Gibson strikes out Alex Gordon swinging in the top of the 1st inning to pick up his first K of the 2017 season

media.headline: Santana's great leaping catch
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Santana makes a leaping grab near the wall
media.bigblurb: Danny Santana races back towards the warning track in left field to make a great leaping catch in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Polanco's RBI single
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Polanco drives an RBI single to center field
media.bigblurb: Jorge Polanco lines an RBI single to down the center, giving the Twins a 1-0 lead in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Rosario's RBI fielder's choice
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Rosario plates Castro on fielder's choice
media.bigblurb: Eddie Rosario brings home Jason Castro on a fielder's choice, extending the Twins' lead 2-0 in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Hammel's first K with the Royals
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Hammel records his first strikeout as a Royal
media.bigblurb: Jason Hammel logs his first strikeout as a member of the Royals by fanning Brian Dozier in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Mauer starts double play
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Mauer makes pick to start a 3-6-1 double play
media.bigblurb: Joe Mauer fields a grounder and throws to Jorge Polanco, turning it to Kyle Gibson for the double play to end the top of the 4th

media.headline: Perez's solo homer
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Perez drills a solo home run to left-center
media.bigblurb: Salvador Perez gets the Royals on the board by hammering a solo home run to left-center field to cut the club's deficit to 2-1 in the 5th

media.headline: Escobar's double
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Escobar drives an RBI double to left field
media.bigblurb: Alcides Escobar knocks a ball deep to left field for a double. Paulo Orlando scored on a throw to tie the game at 2 in the top of the 5th

media.headline: Kepler's RBI double
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Kepler smashes an RBI double to right field
media.bigblurb: Max Kepler knocks Brian Dozier home with a double to right field, giving the Twins a 3-2 lead in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Moustakas' solo homer
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Moustakas launches a solo shot to right field
media.bigblurb: Mike Moustakas cranks a solo home run to right field to tie the game at 3 in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Pressly escapes trouble
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Pressly escapes a bases-loaded jam in the 6th
media.bigblurb: Ryan Pressly forces Alcides Escobar to ground into a fielder's choice to escape a bases-loaded jam in the 6th inning

media.headline: Moylan K's Buxton
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Moylan fans Buxton to escape bases-loaded jam
media.bigblurb: Peter Moylan strikes out Byron Buxton swinging to escape a bases-loaded jam in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Polanco's great throw
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Polanco makes nice scoop, throw to nab Hosmer
media.bigblurb: Jorge Polanco scoops a grounder at short and makes a strong throw to first base to rob Eric Hosmer of a hit in the 7th

media.headline: Castro's go-ahead RBI double
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Castro smacks go-ahead RBI double to center
media.bigblurb: Jason Castro lines a double to center field to bring home Miguel Sano, giving the Twins a 4-3 lead in the bottom of the 7th

media.headline: Polanco's RBI double
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Polanco plates Castro with a double to left
media.bigblurb: Jorge Polanco hits a grounder to left field, bringing home Jason Castro to extend the Twins' lead 5-3 in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Belisle K's Mondesi
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Belisle strikes out Mondesi swinging in 8th
media.bigblurb: Matt Belisle strikes out Raul Mondesi swinging for the final out in the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Kintzler notches the save
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Kintzler fans Cain to lock down the save
media.bigblurb: Brandon Kintzler strikes out Lorenzo Cain swinging to earn his first save of the season and seal the Twins' 5-3 win

media.headline: Molitor on impressive sweep
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Molitor on the Twins sweeping the Royals
media.bigblurb: Twins manager Paul Molitor discusses the Twins' resolve in withstanding a late comeback attempt by the Royals and earning the sweep

media.headline: 4/6/17 CG: KC@MIN
media.blurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: KC@MIN
media.bigblurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: KC@MIN

media.headline: Recap: KC 3, MIN 5
media.blurb: 4/6/17: Twins sweep Royals in three-game series
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Miguel Sano and Jason Castro drove in four of the Twins' five runs, while Kyle Gibson struck out five over five frames
